t: What's the difference between the original Prusa and the Amazon generic make? – Hardware, firmware and software help – Prusa3D Forum
s: I read the wiki, my budget and interest fits the Prusa i3. The original kit is $599 and I found this amazon kit for CAD$349. I read the reviews and apparently the Amazon one has a couple of flaws. One user reports having to update the BT7272A board firmware and replacing the crappy hotend.
